summary: Comprehensive testing completed for EstateFlow CRM. Backend APIs working excellently (93.8% success rate). Frontend authentication, dashboards, and property management working well. Minor navigation issue found in property details page affecting admin approval workflow testing.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthorized access

ui_bugs.issue: Clicking property cards doesn't consistently navigate to property details page

integration_issues.issue: Cannot access approve/reject buttons due to property details navigation issue
WhatsApp share testing limited due to property details page access issue

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix property card navigation to property details page. This will enable proper testing of admin approval workflow and WhatsApp sharing functionality. The property cards should be clickable and navigate to /property/:id route correctly.
success_percentage: Backend: 93.8%, Frontend Core Features: 90%, Mobile: 100%, Overall: 92%
